source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest, featuring tall trees with thick trunks and a forest floor covered in moss and rocks. As the camera moves forward, the trees and rocks remain in view, with the sunlight filtering through the canopy, creating a serene and lush environment. The camera continues to glide smoothly through the forest, revealing more of the dense foliage and the natural landscape. The movement of the camera provides a continuous view of the forest, highlighting the tranquility and beauty of the natural setting.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest, featuring tall trees with thick trunks and a forest floor covered in moss and rocks. As the camera moves forward, the trees and rocks remain in view, with the sunlight filtering through the canopy, creating a serene and lush environment. The camera continues to glide smoothly through the forest, revealing more of the dense foliage and the natural landscape. The movement of the camera provides a continuous view of the forest, highlighting the tranquility and beauty of the natural setting.

bad_caption: The video opens with a wide shot of a bustling city street, where cars drive past tall glass buildings and pedestrians cross at a busy intersection. As the camera pans to the right, a group of cyclists rides along a dedicated bike lane, weaving between traffic. The camera then moves forward, following a street vendor who pushes a cart filled with colorful balloons down the sidewalk. Throughout the video, the camera maintains a steady pace, capturing the lively movement of people and vehicles in the urban environment.
